detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Brazilian briefs in jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with an extra-high waist. Slightly looser fit with straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Coat in soft, felted wool containing some cashmere with narrow notch lapels, large patch front pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No buttons. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatshirt is organic.
Satin slides with feathers on top and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Lightly padded bomber jacket in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a polo neck, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Shirt dress in a cotton weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Long sleeves with a gathered seam and buttoned cuffs.
Mesh trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fitted top in jersey with a low-cut back and long sleeves.
Yoga socks with elastic straps that cross over the feet and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in slub linen jersey with a round neck and rounded hem.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in woven fabric with a regular, elasticated waist, welt back pockets and tapered legs. Wide cotton jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved tops in a soft modal and cotton blend with short slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Gently flared, calf-length skirt in sturdy satin with a regular waist. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side. Unlined.
Short dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Smocked seam at the waist and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Soft, non-wired bras in lace with adjustable shoulder straps, mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide hem. No fasteners.
Elasticated velour scrunchies.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Sweetheart neckline with narrow elastication at the back, covered buttons down the front and short sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Shorts in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, leg pockets and fake welt back pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 2 cm.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist. Layered over short jersey inner leggings.

Coat in sturdy twill made from a viscose blend with a stand-up collar with concealed press-studs and a concealed zip down the front. Welt side pockets, one inner pocket, a zip at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.

Trousers in an airy weave that can be converted to long shorts. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and legs that can be folded up and fastened with a tab and button.

prod_name: Kim HW satin Pull- on trs
detail_desc: Ankle-length trousers in satin crêpe with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and elasticated hems.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Multi-strand necklace of thin metal chains in various designs with two pendants. Adjustable length of approx. 42-50 cm.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Wide, V-neck tunic in a viscose weave with a stand-up collar and ties at the neck. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a drawstring and flounce at the cuffs, and seams with flounces in the lower section.
Short-sleeved football shirt in printed, fast-drying functional fabric with press-studs at the back.
T-shirt in viscose jersey with a motif.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with a double-layered stand-up collar with a gathered seam at the front and a small opening with buttons at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Kaftan in airy, patterned crinkled fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, concealed pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Wide, V-neck blouse in an airy cotton weave with long, wide sleeves and a gathered seam under the bust. Embroidered pattern and cutwork embroidery around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Checked suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a lined hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Henley shirt in slub jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.

Sports top in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a zip at the top and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Soft leggings with a scalloped elasticated waist.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, racer back, wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Round sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets, back pockets and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Short-sleeved tops in cotton jersey.
Tulle skirt with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined, rib-trimmed drawstring hood. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front. Jersey-lined, wrapover hood, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Soft jersey tops with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, one back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Sleeveless lace dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist. Jersey lining.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Fancy dress costume in soft velour with a zip down the front and a hood with embroidered and padded appliqués. Hook and loop fastening at the front, appliqué and elastication at the cuffs, and elasticated hems. Removable tail fin with a hook and loop fastening.
Wide jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft, cable knit with a faux fur pompom on top and a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Set in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and short sleeves with ribbed trims. Shorts with an elasticated waist and narrow ribbing at the hems.
Soft jersey vest top in a relaxed fit with a rib trim around the neckline and deep armholes with raw edges, and short slits in the sides.
Leggings in extra sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and narrow sides with decorative gathers and rings.

Short-sleeved shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Knitted headband containing some mohair with a wrapover detail at the front.
Long skirt in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a high waist, buttons at one side and a gathered seam at the hips. Unlined.
